Test for README example
===
2
===
Bacon ipsum dolor amet
pariatur ground round
dolore meatloaf nisi
shoulder.
Consequat rump spare
ribs ham hock shank.
Magna esse nisi
frankfurter picanha
salami. Enim ground
round ball tip, ex tail
incididunt pastrami
biltong t-bone meatloaf.
===
Bacon ipsum dolor amet
pariatur ground round
dolore meatloaf nisi
Consequat rump spare
Magna esse nisi
frankfurter picanha
salami. Enim ground
round ball tip, ex tail
incididunt pastrami
biltong t-bone meatloaf.
===
```diff
 2: pariatur ground round
 3: dolore meatloaf nisi
-4: shoulder.
 5: Consequat rump spare
-6: ribs ham hock shank.
 7: Magna esse nisi
 8: frankfurter picanha
```
